statements: SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE read_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT notification_type, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 5 AND read_status = TRUE;
SELECT message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, notification_type, read_status FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Email' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, notification_type, message FROM notifications WHERE read_status = false;
SELECT DISTINCT notification_type FROM notifications;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY user_id, created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, notification_type, content FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN notifications ON users.user_id = notifications.user_id;
SELECT username, notification_type, created_at FROM users JOIN notifications ON users.user_id = notifications.user_id WHERE notifications.notification_type = 'news' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_text, created_at FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message_id, receiver_id, created_at FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'inbox' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-02-01';
SELECT users.username, messages.message_text FROM users JOIN messages ON users.user_id = messages.sender_id WHERE users.user_id = 3;

SELECT notifications.notification_type, messages.message_text, users.username FROM notifications JOIN messages ON notifications.message_id = messages.message_id JOIN users ON notifications.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY notifications.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications;
SELECT message, created_at FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, status FROM FriendRequests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message, created_at FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM Messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age >= 18 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, status FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT notification_type, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, target_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
